title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 - Jun 2 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 - Jun 2 2022
description:
Clay admits to his obsession with the Johnny Depp-Amber Heard trial. Callers weigh in on the Depp-Heard verdict. David Zweig of The Atlantic joins Clay and Buck to discuss the New York Times' admission that mask mandates didn't work, whether closing schools for covid will go down in history as a Vietnam-level mistake. Fake News hero Michael Avenatti sentenced to 4 years in jail for stealing from Stormy Daniels.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
